item.description:
Friends, as many of you know, Healthbox is one of the top startup accelerators focused on healthcare. They have just opened their applications for Boston 2013 and they are organizing a mega networking event to celebrate the launch of their Boston 2013 program.

Come meet with other healthcare entrepreneurs, leaders and investors. Nina Nashif, founder of Healthbox, will discuss trends in healthcare innovation and give a sneak preview of Healthbox's expanded new platform.

More details on http://healthbox.com/events/3
item.name: Healthbox Boston 2013 networking night
